When design meets code

Designing different medium was always been my niche, but since I learned how to code I became attached to it, but I do not want to ditch my first love, so why not combine them? then Art as an aspiring front end web developer was born.

Why me?

knowledgeable of modern front end web technologies and continously expanding my knowledge in web development, I am enthused to grab any opportunities where I can apply and enhance my skills in web design and development.
